title: Developing leadership
brief_description: Discusses those traits of character which contribute to a boy’s capacity as a leader. The film is centred around a story in which a boy responds to an emergency and proves himself to be a leader by his enthusiasm, by his vision and imagination, and by his readiness to accept responsibility.
